item.title: How to Spot Wantrepreneurs
item.description: Did you know that Wordpress, the software that powers roughly 1/4th of all websites on the internet, is open-source? This means a lot of things, but on a practical level it means people can just download all the code that powers a Wordpress site, put it on their own server, create their own Wordpress site, and worry only about the costs of keeping the server running. You don’t have to pay for the code.
